The awesome thing about Portal 2 is that you use not only your brain but also comunication with your co-op partner. :)

YES!

Wie schon der erste Teil, einfach genial. Es streichelt das Ego, wenn man mal wieder fast intuitiv eine Kammer gemeistert hat, aber natürlich auch, wenn man die Lösung erst nach einer Weile findet und die "Nuss knacken" musste. Eine besser gemachte  Lernkurve ist kaum vorstellbar. Viel länger als der erste Teil und mit viel mehr Ideen. Die Atmosphäre ist genauso großartig wie im ersten Teil, allein das Intro und das unverhoffte Wiedersehen mit Glados sind soooo cool.
Most original and addictive puzzle game ever!!!
Loved the story! Now to play co-op
шикарна она,ну очень шикарна

Hit terminal velocity in a cheap hotel room
10/10
Best game

Der Nachfolger des Kultspieles steht diesem in nichts nach! Und der "Bösewicht" ist mal wieder toll in Szene gesetzt.

Selbst nach dem Story-Mode hat man die Möglichkeit, im Coop-Modus mit einem Freund weitere Level zu meistern, vorgefertigte sowie Workshop-Level eröffnen hier eine grenzenlose Spielwelt. Absoluter All-Time-Favorit in meiner Spiele-Bibliothek.

The cost to entertainment ratio of this game is higher than any other game I can remember playing. Easy, difficult, fun, irritating puzzles - they all entertain. I learned a lot about myself - *how* I solve puzzles in general - and I don't think it'd be a ridiculous statement to make when I say that this game has the potential to better you beyond the playtime spent in it.
Tsa !!!

Che dire? Uno dei pochi giochi che non smetterei mai di rigiocare. Impegnativo ma mai frustrante, stimola il ragionamento mentre la storia diverte con un humour a dir poco esilarante.
La cooperativa online merita tanto quanto il single player.
Infine, la possibilità di creare livelli di gioco personalizzati è il fiore all'occhiello. Permetterà di rigiocarlo all'infinito.

Assolutamente non deve mancare nella vostra collezione!!

Cave Johnson: Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man whose gonna burn your house down - with the lemons! 
GLaDOS: Oh, I like this guy. 
Cave Johnson: I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that'll burn your house down!
Ахуенная игра!
First person puzzle game that entices the player via set after set of revelations and epiphanies; memorable, witty dialogue; and a mindfully crafted, atmospheric setting.
I recommend This
love this game :luv:

Tiene una historia muy divertida, la jugabilidad es bastante buena y promete varias horas de entretenimiento en su campaña de un jugador. Además, también incluye una campaña multijugador que expande aún más el juego, por no hablar de la enorme cantidad de contenido de comunidad al que se puede acceder a través de la workshop.
Great Games. Challenging and requires thought

C'est un jeu fraiment intéressant. Il est vraiment sympa et encore plus quand vous jouer en binome. Certains niveaux vont vous faire chauffer le cerveau ! N'hésitez pas à l'acheter si vous voulez vous amuser.

If you enjoyed the first one, the second is similar (at least in single player mode) in all the good ways and even better if that is possible in what really makes the Portal series a classic. Longer gameplay, more subtle - and not so subtle - dark humor, and now true multiplayer.

Word of advice for multiplayer; if at all possible choose someone who can finish it with you since much of the fun is the A-HA! moment when the two of you discover the solution to the particular room you are in.
Király :D
GREAT GAME!!

Funny and lighthearted puzzle-platformer, with a deep story behind the scenes for those who care. Lovely story for singleplayer, and lots of fun for playing with a friend in multiplayer too!
And once you're done with all the official stuff, there's a bunch of community levels as well! Lots of replay value, and definitely worth giving a try!
El mejor
Dovevate approfittare dell'offerta! Se non l'avete fatto poveri voi!!!
Altamente adictivo. Muy buen juego, muy cuidado en todos los aspectos. Totalmente recomendado.

Portal 2 should be Portal^2. Longer (at least in my subjective opinion), funnier, with more of a story and even a twist. And whenever you get tired of beating the campaing again and again, there's always the workshop - filled with user-created goodiness, that's just waiting for you to beat it/use it/whatever.
One of the best game ever made! Buy it, play it, enjoy it!
Your partner in science!

Teljesen rendhagyó puzzle-játék szép grafikával és érdekes történettel, az első részhez képest is rengeteg újítással
A co-op részt éppen csak kipróbáltam, de az is hihetetlenül jónak tűnik.
Кул игра,в которую я гамал каждый день на приставке,потом начал гамать через Steam-не пожалал :D
C'est un jeu à absolument posséder !! Vous n'avez pas le choix !
Fancy stuff
Awesome co-op!
Juegazo siguiendo la linea del anteriror y con muy buenos graficos.a todos los que les guste pensar un poco este es su juego...
One of the best games ever created!
Ainda melhor que o primeiro! História super bem elaborada e puzzles de quebrar a cabeça!

This game rocks! I never played a game that included puzzles, graphics, fun, and the concept of using portals to transport objects to solve a puzzle. Reminds me of a Chuck Norris joke I came up with a while back. He punches so fast a time warp opens and his fist disappears only to reappear behind his head just for practice. 

This game is probably what opened my ways of purchasing games digitally. You can try to work around technology via DRM, DosBox, Roland MT-32, emulation,  etc... but if not for this game and Steam, I never would have embraced the digital age of owning or licensing things digitally. I can look at it any way I want, supporting the developers leads to sequels.

Jogo SEN-SA-CIO-NAL! Melhor jogo de 2011, em minha opinião. O primeiro jogo fica parecendo apenas um protótipo quando comparado a esse. Pegou tudo o que havia de bom no anterior e melhorou os pontos fracos. Se você gosta de puzzles e está procurando um jogo com um ótimo storytelling, personagens carismáticos e engraçados, Portal 2 é o que você precisa!

PROs: Puzzles inteligentes, jogabilidade melhorada, excelente voice acting, personagens carismáticos, ótima trilha sonora, storytelling impecável, frases e momentos memoráveis, duração aumentada da campanha principal, campanha adicional em co-op, possibilidade de poder criar suas próprias fases e jogar fases criadas por outros jogadores.

CONTRAs: A duração do modo cooperativo poderia ser um pouco maior.
in dis gem u shot portels to find a potatoe

This is a puzzle game for those who are wondering.
You shoot portals with your gun to go past obsatacles in your path.

My IQ is 50, but since I completed this game twice I call bulls**t on that IQ test.
Make no mistake, the game is not easy atleast not for me since I struggle with even multiplying 13 times 17. But I completed it somehow. My mom says I dont have to go to "special" school anymore.

One more thing, I love the villian of this game. Sarcastic and sadistic just like me.
A must get. Funny, witty and abso-frickin' hilarious.
GET IT, DONT EVEN THINK ABOUT NOT GETTING IT, SERIOUSLY WHAT ARE YOU DOING STILL READING THIS. BUY. IT. NOW.
Soo soooo addictive :(

Fantastic game, excellent story, immersive world.  It's easy to get sucked into the fiction of the world.  Very cohesive game everything blends well together, from the music to the characters.  The puzzles are very well done and can wrack your brain at times but if you survey each area very thoroughly the answer becomes clear.  A must buy for any gamer.  This game is the reason I play video games.  It is that good.  I hope there is a 3.
Le mode solo et multijoueurs est complement jouissif ! =)

Portal hosts a lot of fun, dynamic and endless gameplay. With the new Steam Workshop it literally turns this game from a 8 hour playthrough to an endless count of puzzles, frustrations and endearing sense of accomplishment!

This game is truly for those who enjoy puzzles that may take more than one sit-down for you and your COOP partner to contemplate 

BUY THIS GAME!

Portal 2 kann ich wirklich ausnahmslos jedem Spieler nur wärmstens ans Herz legen! Die Story ist toll, das Gameplay so gut und frisch wie im Vorgänger, durch die Gele außerdem um eine sehr spaßige Option erweitert, und die Spielzeit ist dieses Mal auch ansprechend lang ausgefallen. Und im wirklich großartigen Koop-Modus macht das Ganze dann gleich nochmal so viel Spaß!
